word_mean: 心电图：在体表测出心肌兴奋时产生电流变化的描记图。正常心电图显示心房和心室活动产生的波形。首先出现的P波是由心房兴奋所致。QRS波则是心室兴奋(去极化)所致。T波是心室恢复(复极化)波。U波是在正常心电图T波后立即发生的来源不明的电位波，低血钾时增强。缩写为ECG或EKG。另见lead

sentence.Network_cn: 心电图上标明心跳次数.

sentence.Network_en: Perhaps the single most widely used monitoring device is the electrocardiogram.
sentence.Network_cn: 心电图可能是最广为应用的监测仪.

sentence.Network_en: A total of 109 patients underwent physical examination, electrocardiogram and echo cardiography.
sentence.Network_cn: 总计109个病人做了体格检查, 心电图,超生心动图.

entry.def: If someone has an electrocardiogram, doctors use special equipment to measure the electric currents produced by that person's heart in order to see whether it is working normally.

means.word_mean: 1. a graphical recording of the cardiac cycle produced by an electrocardiograph

auth_sentence.content: Standard exams, such as an electrocardiogram, are usually unable to reveal the condition, but a genetic test can.
